org.spongepowered.api.text.transform

Interface TextFormatter<E extends TextRepresentable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<E>, TextElement, TextRepresentable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PartitionedTextFormatter<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicPartitionedTextFormatter, FixedPartitionedTextFormatter, MessageEvent.MessageFormatter, SimpleTextFormatter

    public interface TextFormatter<E extends TextRepresentable>
extends TextRepresentable, Iterable<E>
    A TextFormatter is a mutable collection of TextRepresentables which are all concatenated to an empty Text object on format().

      • format

        default Text format()
        Builds the result Text for this formatter using the current configuration of each element. The result of each element is concatenated to an empty Text to yield the result.
        Returns:
        Text result of formatter

      • iterator

        default Iterator<E> iterator()
        Specified by:

      • toText

        default Text toText()
        Description copied from interface: TextRepresentable
        Gets the textual representation of this instance for its usage in other Text objects. This may but does not need to include hover texts or other actions. This method is basically the toString() equivalent for Texts.
        Specified by:
        toText in interface TextRepresentable
        Returns:
        The text instance representing this instance
